ðŸŒ± Patch AM: Brockton shooting leaves two injured

Cheers Brockton! Weâ€™re back, helping you stay up to date with whatâ€™s happening. Let's take on the day together! â˜•ï¸ï¸ In today's newsletter:
- Brockton shooting leaves two injured
- Brockton driving school bribery scandal

Also on today's calendar: Brockton Rox vs. Down East Bird Dawgs and 18 other events.

- Thursday: Breezy and warm with hazy sun, with a high of 88 and low of 57 degrees. ðŸŒ¶ Hot!
- Friday: Pleasant with clouds and sun, temps: high: 79, low: 58.
- Saturday: A couple of morning showers, with a high of 65 and low of 54 degrees.
ðŸ“° News we're reading
â€¢ Shooting in Massachusetts city leaves two people with injuries (wcvb.com) â€” Brockton police are investigating a shooting that left two people injured on Battles Farm Drive. The incident occurred on Tuesday, with a woman and a juvenile male sustaining non-life-threatening injuries. The cause of the shooting remains unclear.
Find out what's happening in Brocktonfor free with the latest updates from Patch.
â€¢ Brockton driving school owner pleads guilty to bribing RMV road test examiners (bostonglobe.com) â€” A Brockton driving school owner has pleaded guilty to bribing RMV examiners, paying between $20,000 and $30,000 to secure licenses for unqualified applicants. The plea deal suggests a lower-end sentence recommendation.
â€¢ Three Framingham MA residents are among eight charged in tax refund check scheme (milforddailynews.com) â€” A Brockton resident is among eight individuals charged in a tax refund scheme involving over $8.8 million. The group allegedly altered Treasury checks and deposited them into shell company accounts. The case highlights ongoing efforts to combat federal tax fraud.

- Have you seen me??
We are missing our inside/outside kitty Switch, hoping someone can let me know if youâ€™ve seen him. He is not fixed (has an appointment next month)â€¦ (NextdoorCumberland Farms) - There are foxes out and theyâ€™re hungry.
I had a baby, extremely skinny in the yard tonight. He was eating the peanuts/bird seed leftovers. Keep your cats in, be outside (yes even in yourâ€¦ ([Nextdoor](https://nextdoor.com/p/BNb6Rg45FXm_/?from_partner=patch&share_id=BNb6Rg45FXm_&utm_medium=public_api&utm_source=patch&utm_content=BNb6Rg45FXm_&next_url=/p/BNb6Rg45FXm_&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=pilot)Hovendon)
